cu.explanation_en: Setting AMF IP to the same as CU's local_s_address '127.0.0.5' will cause IP range conflict and routing failure to AMF.

du.explanation_en: Setting Ta4 to [180, 110] (min > max) will cause timing misalignment and front-haul synchronization failure.
du.explanation_zh: 將 Ta4 設定為 [180, 110]（最小值 > 最大值）會導致定時錯位並造成前傳同步失敗。
